title: Google\Cloud\ServiceControl\V1\Distribution\LinearBuckets
name: LinearBuckets
description:
Describing buckets with constant width.

Generated from protobuf message google.api.servicecontrol.v1.Distribution.LinearBuckets

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.num_finite_buckets
params.description: The number of finite buckets. With the underflow and overflow buckets, the total number of buckets is num_finite_buckets + 2. See comments on bucket_options for details.

params.name: data.width
params.description: The i'th linear bucket covers the interval [offset + (i-1) width, offset + i width) where i ranges from 1 to num_finite_buckets, inclusive. Must be strictly positive.

params.name: data.offset
params.description: The i'th linear bucket covers the interval [offset + (i-1) width, offset + i width) where i ranges from 1 to num_finite_buckets, inclusive.

methods.name: getNumFiniteBuckets
methods.description:
The number of finite buckets. With the underflow and overflow buckets, the total number of buckets is num_finite_buckets + 2.
